kubernetes-metrics.name: kubernetes-metrics
kubernetes-metrics.description: Faker for Kubernetes - deployment rollout and pod health monitoring
args: Generate Kubernetes metrics API tools for deployment rollout analysis. Include tools for: 1) Deployment status (get_deployment_status, get_rollout_history, check_pod_health), 2) Resource utilization (get_pod_cpu_memory, get_node_capacity, analyze_resource_requests_vs_limits), 3) Scaling events (get_hpa_status, track_autoscaling_events, analyze_pod_churn), 4) Health checks (get_readiness_probe_failures, get_liveness_probe_failures, check_crash_loop_backoffs), 5) Network metrics (get_service_endpoints, analyze_ingress_traffic, track_network_policies). Accept namespace, deployment_name, time_range, and version parameters.
